item.title: Magic of RSS!
item.dc:creator: Brian Kirsten
item.content:encoded: Whoo hoo! I got a php RSS reader working on Christine's site! Now whenever she does a new eBay auction or when one expires it will be auto-magically reflected on her site. I'm such a computer dork.
item.excerpt:encoded: Whoo hoo! I got a php RSS reader working on Christine's site! Now whenever she does a new eBay auction or when one expires it will be auto-magically reflected on her site. I'm such a computer dork.
